thread.section_title: Argento Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Argento | argento.ie
thread.title: Rachel Lattimore

author: Rachel Lattimore
title: Rachel Lattimore
text: My order was accepted as earrings were in stock when I ordered. My money was also accepted then 2 days later I received an email stating that they were out of stock and my money was refunded. I felt it was false advertising and I told my mother i bought these earrings for her birthday. I will never purchase from Argento again or recommend their site to anyone else. Rachel Lattimore from Dunlin
